snippet: Jovanotti, an Italian rapper, has moved with his family to an apartment in Greenwich Village, and on Saturday he will perform at Terminal 5 in Manhattan as part of a national tour.
abstract: Italian rapper Jovanotti, who recently moved to New York City hoping to make his mark in the United States, will perform at Terminal 5 as part of a national tour.
lead_paragraph: Jovanotti, an Italian rapper, has moved with his family to an apartment in Greenwich Village, and on Saturday he will perform at Terminal 5 in Manhattan as part of a national tour.

headline.seo: Jovanotti, Italian Rapper, Brings His Act to New York
headline.main: A Roman Rapper Comes to New York, Where He Can Get Real
headline.print_headline: A Roman Rapper Comes to New York, Where He Can Get Real
